liquid-waste.disposal: Pour bleach into flask/container with the liquid, allow to sit for 5-10 minutes, pour down drain, rinse flask/container with lots of water, and flush drain with lots of water

flammable-liquid-waste.disposal: Add to waste container in fume hood for proper disposal (disposal done on campus). Make sure container is labelled with appropriate concentrations of each waste component.

urine.disposal: Pour down drain, flush drain with lots of water, pour bleach into flask/container, allow to sit for 5 -10 minutes, pour bleach down drain, rinse flask with lots of water, and flush drain with lots of water

used-gloves.disposal: Spray with ethanol and throw in garbage

used-slides.disposal: Thoroughly wash with water - can be reused
